Directives > ui-toggle

ui-toggle

Toggle Light


<ui-toggle ng-model="selectedOption" id="toggle1"></ui-toggle>

Toggle Dark, multiple items


<script>
$scope.items = [{
    name: 'First Item 123456789',
    selected: false
}, {
    name: 'Second Item 098765432',
    selected: true
}, {
    name: 'Third Item 123456789',
    selected: true
}, {
    name: 'Fourth Item 5555',
    selected: false
}, {
    name: 'Fifth Item rrrr',
    selected: true
}];

$scope.changeItem = function(item) {
    console.log(item.name + ":" + item.selected);
};
</script>

<div ng-repeat="item in items">
    <ui-toggle dark ng-model="item.selected" ng-change="changeItem(item)"></ui-toggle>
</div>
